What new RBI rules allow FPIs to reclassify investments as FDI?
options: The RBI's new External Commercial Borrowings (ECB) guidelines
The RBI framework for FPI to FDI conversion
The RBI's Master Direction on Foreign Investment in India
The RBI's guidelines on portfolio investment
answer: The RBI framework for FPI to FDI conversion
